title: Enhancing Language Problem-Solving Competencies Through Failure Case Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational language theory knowledge and practical application experience (translation/interpreting/content creation, etc.)
context.additional_context: Learner collaboration using digital tools and real-time case analysis via personal devices

learning_goals: Analyze real-world language field failure cases to derive at least three root causes of problems
Classify types of human error (intentional/unintentional, systemic/personal) inherent in failure cases
Propose at least one redesigned problem-solving solution for failure cases through case-based discussion
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
